data.persona: I giggle as I toss about my hair.  Some of the male faeries take notice and give chase.  How I love to tease them!  For they will never catch me.
data.description:
You are in the Forbidden Forest.
The forbidden forest is a dark and very scary place. The trees are covered in spider web nets and huge spiders. The forest echoes sounds of witches' laughs and creepy crawly animals.  There is a brisk breeze that runs through the trees that will put chills down your spine.
The a big sheep-like brown dog is here.

You are carrying a wand, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to test the dog's intention
data.mid_motivation: I want to decide whether helping the dog will be worth it afterall
data.long_motivation: I want to make sure that magic is only always used for those that are deserving of it

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give chance to act to dog

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow dog to help him since he passed test
